content: bellflower bucket hat beginner crochet pattern by miss witchcrafts you can never have enough florals inspired by the beautiful bellflower this sweet flower shaped bucket hat is a great accessory for the sunny days of spring and summer the pattern is designed to make a osfm adult hat instagram @misswitchcrafts + ribblr https //ribblr com/shop/miss-witchcrafts + ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/misswitchcrafts miss witchcrafts i m kiki a craft enthusiast and pet parent based in northern california i learned the basics of crochet nearly 30 years ago and in recent years have been designing crochet patterns i believe in accessibility and clear instruction within written crochet patterns so each of my designs is written to be enjoyed by crafters of all skill levels firmly within my granny era i adore cottagecore themes fresh florals and the versatility of simple stitches thank you for your interest in my design - i hope it serves you well and please don t hesitate to reach out with any questions or pattern assistance needs i would love to see your work please feel free to tag me on instagram - @misswitchcrafts m a t e r i a l s n e e d e d appx 170 yds / 100 g 4 medium acrylic yarn 5 5 mm hook yarn needle to weave in ends stitch marker optional snips s t i t c h e s & a b b r e v i a t i o n s u s t e r m s st / sts stitch / stitches chain/chs chain s sl slip stitch single_crochet single_crochet skip skip half_double_crochet half_double_crochet space -
